00047 #define CDB_NUM_HASH_TABLE_POINTER 512
00048 
00049 class URDB;
00050 
00051 typedef void  (*vPFpc)(char*);
00052 typedef void* (*pvPFpvpb)(void*,bool*);
00053 typedef void  (*vPFprpr)(UStringRep*, UStringRep*);
00054 
00055 class U_EXPORT UCDB : public UFile {
00056 public:
00057 
00058         typedef struct datum {
00059                 void* dptr;
00060                 uint32_t dsize;
00061         } datum;
00062 
00063         typedef struct cdb_hash_table_pointer {
00064                 uint32_t pos;   // starting byte position of the hash table
00065                 uint32_t slots; //                number of slots in the hash table
00066         } cdb_hash_table_pointer;
00067 
00068         typedef struct cdb_record_header {
00069                 uint32_t klen; //  key length
00070                 uint32_t dlen; // data length
00071         } cdb_record_header;
00072 
00073         typedef struct cdb_hash_table_slot {
00074                 uint32_t hash; // hash value of the key
00075                 uint32_t pos;  // starting byte position of the record (0 -> slot empty)
00076         } cdb_hash_table_slot;
00077 
00078         // COSTRUTTORI
00079 
00080         UCDB(bool _ignore_case)
00081                 {
00082                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCDB, "%b", _ignore_case)
00083 
00084                 ignore_case = _ignore_case;
00085                 }
00086 
00087         UCDB(const UString& path, bool _ignore_case) : UFile(path)
00088                 {
00089                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCDB, "%.*S,%b", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(path), _ignore_case)
00090 
00091                 ignore_case = _ignore_case;
00092                 }
00093 
00094         ~UCDB()
00095                 {
00096                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCDB)
00097                 }

00101         bool open(bool brdonly = true);
00102 
00103         bool open(const UString& pathdb, bool brdonly = true)
00104                 {
00105                 U_TRACE(0, "UCDB::open(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(pathdb))
00106 
00107                 UFile::setPath(pathdb);
00108 
00109                 return UCDB::open(brdonly);
00110                 }

00112         // Ricerche
00113 
00114         void setKey(     UStringRep* _key)        {  key.dptr = (void*) _key->data(); key.dsize =  _key->size(); }
00115         void setKey( const UString&  _key)        {  key.dptr = (void*) _key.data();  key.dsize =  _key.size(); }
00116         void setData(const UString& _data)        { data.dptr = (void*)_data.data(); data.dsize = _data.size(); }
00117         void setData(void* dptr, uint32_t dsize)  { data.dptr = dptr;                data.dsize = dsize; }
00118 
00119         bool find(const UString& _key)
00120                 {
00121                 U_TRACE(0, "UCDB::find(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(_key))
00122 
00123                 setKey(_key);
00124 
00125                 cdb_hash();
00126 
00127                 return find();
00128                 }
00129 
00130         bool findNext(); // handles repeated keys...

00134         uint32_t size() const
00135                 {
00136                 U_TRACE(0, "UCDB::size()")
00137 
00138                 U_RETURN(nrecord);
00139                 }
00140 
00141         UString elem()
00142                 {
00143                 U_TRACE(0, "UCDB::elem()")
00144 
00145                 UString str((const char*)data.dptr, data.dsize);
00146 
00147                 U_RETURN_STRING(str);
00148                 }

00150         bool ignoreCase() const { return ignore_case; }

00172         // hashing function
00173 
00174         uint32_t cdb_hash(const char* t, uint32_t tlen)
00175                 {
00176                 U_TRACE(0, "UCDB::cdb_hash(%.*S,%u)", tlen, t, tlen)
00177 
00178                 uint32_t h = u_hash((unsigned char*)t, tlen, ignore_case);
00179 
00180                 U_RETURN(h);
00181                 }

00206         // Save memory hash table as Constant DataBase
00207 
00208         static uint32_t sizeFor(uint32_t nrecord)
00209                 {
00210                 U_TRACE(0, "UCDB::sizeFor(%u)", nrecord)
00211 
00212                 uint32_t size = CDB_NUM_HASH_TABLE_POINTER * sizeof(cdb_hash_table_pointer) +
00213                                                          nrecord * (sizeof(cdb_record_header) + sizeof(cdb_hash_table_slot));
00214 
00215                 U_RETURN(size);
00216                 }
00217 
00218         bool writeTo(UHashMap<void*>* t, pvPFpvpb f = 0) { return UCDB::writeTo(*this, t, f); }
00219 
00220         static bool writeTo(const UString& path, UHashMap<void*>* t, pvPFpvpb f = 0)
00221                         { return UCDB(path, t->ignoreCase()).writeTo(t, f); }

00272         void cdb_hash() { khash = cdb_hash((const char*)key.dptr, key.dsize); }

00274         // START-END of record data
00275 
00276         char* start() const { return (UFile::map + CDB_NUM_HASH_TABLE_POINTER * sizeof(cdb_hash_table_pointer)); }
00277         char*   end() const { return (UFile::map + start_hash_table_slot); }

00293         void makeStart()
00294                 {
00295                 U_TRACE(0, "UCDB::makeStart()")
00296 
00297                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_DIFFERS(map, MAP_FAILED)
00298 
00299                 nrecord = start_hash_table_slot = 0;
00300 
00301                 hr = (UCDB::cdb_record_header*) start();
00302                 }
